ValidationRule.description: Deal Desk Authorization Level is required for Deal Desk users when approving or rejecting Deal Desk approval rules
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption), OR( CONTAINS($Label.Deal_Desk_Profiles, $Profile.Name), $Profile.Name = "System Administrator" ), OR( ISPICKVAL(sbaa__Status__c, "Approved"), ISPICKVAL(sbaa__Status__c, "Rejected") ), CONTAINS($Label.Deal_Desk_Approval_Rules, sbaa__Rule__r.Name), ISBLANK(TEXT(Deal_Desk_Authorization_Level__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Deal Desk Authorization Level is required before approving or rejecting this Deal Desk approval.
